name: Deadline (itch) (VamptVo)
description:
Deadline A mission as important as it is dangerous.
Untested technology in the hands of one person.
A time machine running on a short battery.
Recharge with blood. Rejuvenate with power.

Trade health for battery power and vice versa to reach the end of this challenging platformer and discover the true purpose of the time travel mission!

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move, up to jump
  • Buttons 1 (Z) and 2 (X) convert health and battery

The battery runs out whenever you move, and when your battery runs out you slow way down, so look out!

Credits
  • Dave Derwin: Art, level design, sound effects, writing
  • Evan Minto: Code, music, UI, art
